name: Path of the Rabbit
description:
build a small world of paths

for your rabbit to follow

arrow keys to move tile, space to drop tile

r to restart, m to toggle mute, esc to quit

alt + enter to toggle fullscreen

recover thirst at oases

recover carrots by travelling

fight off foxes to get stronger

prepare yourself for the boss



a game by Daniel Linssen
made for Ludum Dare 38
